Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Michigan, Harrison, Wabash, Balbo, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Michigan, Harrison, Wabash, Balbo, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: SB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash, Balbo, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Harrison, Wabash, Balbo, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier  police activity at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier  police activity at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
